content: marley mae is the third square in a series that i am designing as a legacy for my grandchildren marley loves the ocean and volleyball she s analytical has a wicked cynical sense of humor and sings like a bird she s a complicated girl that requires a bit more complicated square design gauge is not important so use any yarn and applicable hook that you please the difficulty level is intermediate the 11 revised square has 39 stitches per side a huge thank you to the testers i could not have done this without them - eva ellen caroline jovette fiona and teresa @ skyhookdesigns **join my facebook group at ~ a yarn of serendipity crochet group 3 links to all my patterns are found on my blog 4 or pinterest 5 ** 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lauren-rose-square 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lauren-rose-square 3 https //www facebook com/groups/www ayarnofserendipity 4 http //pknightonhaener wordpress com 5 https //pin it/g7fcaloku2wutj
